com.mobilerq.android.sdk

Class MrqContentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.mobilerq.android.sdk.MrqContentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MrqSlotView

    public class MrqContentView
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
    A view for a single MrqContent. Content is scaled uniformly (maintaining aspect ratio) from the center so that it completely fills the view (minus padding). Content is drawn using a WebView. When isLoadAnimationEnabled() is true, alpha fades from 0 to 1 when content finishes loading. When there is no content (content is null), visibility is set to GONE and the empty view, if getEmptyView() is set, is set to VISIBLE.

      static interface  MrqContentView.OnLoadListener
      Listen for content load events.
      static interface  MrqContentView.OnViewListener
      MrqContentView.OnViewListener.onView(MrqContentView) will be called when visible content is attached or loaded.

      • isLoadAnimationEnabled

        public boolean isLoadAnimationEnabled()
        Is the loading animation enabled?
        Returns:
        The loading animation is enabled.

      • setLoadAnimationEnabled

        public void setLoadAnimationEnabled(boolean loadAnimationEnabled)
        Enable or disable loading animation.
        Parameters:
        loadAnimationEnabled - true enables animation

      • getContent

        public MrqContent getContent()
        Get the content.
        Returns:
        The content or null if the content has been cleared.

      • setContent

        public void setContent(MrqContent content)
        Set the MrqContent. This loads the content into the WebView and update the view layout.
        Parameters:
        content - The content. Nulls clears the content and set WebView to View.GONE.

      • getEmptyView

        public android.view.View getEmptyView()
        Get the empty view.
        Returns:
        the view

      • setEmptyView

        public void setEmptyView(android.view.View emptyView)
        Set the empty view. Visibility is set to VISIBLE when the there is no content and GONE when there is content.
        Parameters:
        emptyView - the view

      • getWebView

        public android.webkit.WebView getWebView()
        Get the WebView for this content.
        Returns:
        the webview or null if the webview has been destroyed.

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        Call WebView.onResume()

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Call WebView.onResume()

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Remove webview, call WebView.destroy(), and set webview to null. You can't use this view after calling destroy.

      • onInterceptTouchEvent

        public boolean onInterceptTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent e)
        Overrides:
        onInterceptTouchEvent in class android.view.ViewGroup

        protected void onAttachedToWindow()
        Overrides:
        onAttachedToWindow in class android.view.ViewGroup

      • onStartLoad

        public void onStartLoad()
        Called when content starts loading. Calls MrqContentView.OnLoadListener.onStartLoad(MrqContentView), when set.

      • onFinishLoad

        public void onFinishLoad()
        Called when content is loaded. Starts animation when isLoadAnimationEnabled() is true. Calls MrqContentView.OnLoadListener.onFinishLoad(MrqContentView). Calls onVisible() when content is visible.

      • onVisible

        public void onVisible()
        Called when content is attached or loaded. Calls MrqContentView.OnViewListener.onView(MrqContentView), when set.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Is content attached and visible?
        Returns:
        true if content is visible

      • getLoadListener

        public MrqContentView.OnLoadListener getLoadListener()
        Get the load listener
        Returns:
        the load listener

      • setLoadListener

        public void setLoadListener(MrqContentView.OnLoadListener loadListener)
        Set the load listener to be notified by load events.
        Parameters:
        loadListener - the load listener or null to clear listener.

        public MrqContentView.OnViewListener getViewListener()
        Get the view listener
        Returns:
        the view listener
